  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_103055</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_103055</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Convection in air</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konvektion in einer Luft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Convection en air</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Convection no ar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Convezione in aria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεταφορά στον αέρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Convección en aire</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows that the air above the light bulb rises when it gets hot and enables the paper spiral to turn around.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">convection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hot air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light bulb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">paper spiral</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, daß die Luft über der 
Glühlampe steigt, wenn sie heiß erhält und die PapierSpirale
aktiviert, sich herum zu drehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme prouve que l'air au-dessus de 
l'ampoule se lève quand il devient chaud et permet à la spirale de 
papier de tourner autour.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra que o ar acima do bulbo 
claro se levanta quando começa quente e permite a espiral de papel de
girar ao redor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema indica che l'aria sopra la 
lampadina aumenta quando ottiene calda e permette alla spirale di 
carta di girare intorno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα δείχνει ότι ο αέρας επάνω από τον
ελαφρύ βολβό αυξάνεται όταν ζεσταίνεται και επιτρέπει στη 
σπείρα εγγράφου για να γυρίσει γύρω.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra que se levanta el aire 
sobre la bombilla cuando consigue caliente y permite al espiral de 
papel dar vuelta alrededor.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konvektion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heißluft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Glühlampe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">PapierSpirale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">convection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">air chaud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ampoule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">spirale de papier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">convection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ar quente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bulbo claro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">espiral de papel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">convezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">aria calda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lampadina</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">spirale di carta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μεταφορά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καυτός αέρας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ελαφρύς βολβός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σπείρα εγγράφου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">convección</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">aire caliente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">bombilla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">espiral de papel</string>
          </keyword>
